titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to include systemic lupus erythematosis among the chronic diseases that are presumed to be service-connected for purposes of veterans compensation if occurring within one year from a veteran's discharge from active service.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

calendar.text: Committee on Veterans. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 9 ordered to be reported.

action.text: Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from VA, OMB.

bill.summary: 7/14/1987--Introduced. Includes systemic lupus erythematosus among the chronic diseases considered to be service-connected for purposes of veterans' benefits if it manifests itself to a degree of ten percent or more within one year of separation from service.
